roleset.name: right a wrong
roleset.note: REDRESS-V NOTES: Technically, 'redress' could also have a sense of 'get dressed again,'but I doubt that would ever actually occur. VN class equip-13.4.2-1 (implies redressing with some sort of compensation). (from redress.01-v)

example.name: two wrongs make a right?
example.text: It-1 now has the chance [*]-1 to redress that record in Namibia.
